'''Spirit Carp''' is an item that can be found in the [[Chenyu Vale]], [[Liyue]]. It can be offered to the [[Votive Rainjade]] for rewards.

When a Spirit Carp is within close proximity of a player, the icon {{Icon|Spirit Carp}} will appear on their mini map along with a sound effect, like with elemental [[oculi]].

50 Spirit Carp can be found throughout the Chenyu Vale. When the player upgrades the Votive Rainjade to the highest level, they will be granted the {{Achievement|One Ring for the Rite of All}}.

For the rewards and amount needed for each offering level, see [[Rainjade's Benediction]].
